body_html: Yes, I guess what I mean is that the expressions in derivatives.yaml are basically symbolic; I'm wondering what prevents using them to generate the gradient-graph-building code currently handwritten in autodiff.c

body: Yes, I guess what I mean is that the expressions in derivatives.yaml are basically symbolic; I'm wondering what prevents using them to generate the gradient-graph-building code currently handwritten in autodiff.c
